title: Clause 22 - Basic MDIO
summary: Defines a two-wire serial interface for accessing PHY registers using the Management Data Input/Output (MDIO) interface.

title: Clause 45 - Extended MDIO
summary: Expands the MDIO interface to allow addressing multiple devices and registers using a more flexible addressing structure.

title: Clause 49 - Auto-Negotiation
summary: Covers the Auto-Negotiation protocol for 10GBASE-KR, enabling devices to automatically configure optimal link parameters.

title: Clause 74 - FEC
summary: Introduces Forward Error Correction using Reed-Solomon coding for high-speed backplane Ethernet links.

title: Clause 91 - RS-FEC for PAM4
summary: Describes RS-FEC mechanisms used with 100G PAM4 signaling to reduce bit error rates in high-speed Ethernet links.
